altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.ja: トリコ

description.en:
In the world where the taste and texture of food are very important, there is Toriko, a hunter of precious foods regularly hired by restaurants and the rich.  
He's a man with the inhuman skills necessary to capture the ferocious, evasive, and rare animals to complete his ultimate dinner course!  
His current accomplice is a weak, timid person who was inspired by Toriko's greatness and accompanies him on all his journeys on his quest for the course of his life.  
  
Note: Was nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde o sabor e a textura dos alimentos são muito importantes vive Toriko, um caçador de alimentos preciosos regularmente contratado por restaurantes e homens ricos, um homem com aptidões desumanas para capturar os animais ferozes, evasivos e raros para concluir seu sonho de uma refeição perfeita e também um jovem gourmet, uma pessoa fraca e tímida, que foi inspirado pela grandeza de Toriko a acompanha-lo em suas viagens em busca de seu sonho!

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

altTitles.ja: 踊る千年家族

description.en: Seven siblings born in England are characterized by immortality. The underworld, a corrupt hospital, and an international military organization target them as they fulfill mankind's dream! ! For the first time in hundreds of years, a family begins to live together, dancing with fate even if they live for a thousand years...!

altTitles.ja: 怜-Toki-

description.en: A Saki spin-off series. It follows the characters Toki Onjouji, Ryuuka Shimizudani and other girls from Osaka during their elementary and middle school years.

altTitles.ja: ネカマパンチ!!!

description.en: Netkama – a male who portrays himself as female online. This is what Kim Seyeong decides to become after reencountering Shin Heejae, the guy who destroyed Seyeong's gaming career in "Arcadia" a year prior. His plan is to pretend to be a girl in the game, get Heejae to fall for him, and then make the big reveal to everyone so that his archnemesis will also be humiliated out of "Arcadia" forever. But being a dude trying to become the girlfriend of your worst enemy is no easy feat, especially more so when said worst enemy starts to show a bit too much interest in you. Will Seyeong come out the victor of this scheme? Or will he find himself losing to Heejae all over again?

altTitles.ja: 咲
咲 -Saki-
咲‐Saki‐

description.en:
Saki's never been a big fan of mahjong. A lifetime of being forced to play with family at holidays (and losing her money as a consequence...) has left a foul taste for the game in her mouth. When she's convinced, though, to play a game with her classmates, she discovers that not only has fending off her family left her with an uncanny ability for the game but, more surprisingly, that it can even be fun!

Is this revelation enough to cleanse Saki's distaste for the game? Can her classmates convince her to join their club, or is there just too much baggage to make it worth her while?

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.fr: Je veux en finir avec le jeu de l'amour

altTitles.nl: Ik wil een einde aan het liefdesspel

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero acabar com o jogo do "eu te amo"

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

altTitles.ja: おかえり、初恋
田口くんと山根さん
やっぱり変わってない

description.en:
At a high school reunion, the shy Yamane reunites with Taguchi, a friend who used to be a delinquent. Have they changed? Or are they the same as ever?

Original web comic on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/6285426/series/139163) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/x9184/status/1447834425698357254).
description.ja:
同窓会で声をかけてきた爽やかな青年は実は高校時代ぼっち仲間だったヤンキーくんだった。
再会して感じるお互いの変わったところ変わっていないところ…二人の初恋がまた動き出します。

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere ka to Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

description.en:
The Crimson Demon of the Battlefield, Jang Kirin. He spent his days in blood splattering war in the North for the last 13 years.
“Live a normal life.”
Those were the last words the general left me.
“The best way to live normally is to be an innkeeper!”
The youngest of my unit gave me this advice.
I came all the way to Hangzhou believing his advice.

But why is living a ‘normal life’ so much harder than fighting in a war?

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%92%8D%EC%9A%B4%EA%B0%9D%EC%9E%94/2640)
description.ko:
전장의 붉은 악귀 장기린.
북로 전쟁에서 13년 동안 피 튀기는 싸움만 하며 살아왔다.

"평범하게 살거라."
대장군이 남긴 마지막 한마디.

"평범한 삶의 최고는 객잔 주인이라구요!"
적룡기마대 막내가 해준 한마디 조언.
그 말만 믿고 항주에 왔는데

웬걸,

'평범한 생활'이 전쟁보다 더 어렵다!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%92%8D%EC%9A%B4%EA%B0%9D%EC%9E%94/2640)
description.ru:
Алый демон сражений, Чжан Кирин. Долгие 13 лет войны на Северном пути он провел, проливая кровь в бесчисленных боях. «Живи нормальной жизнью», – таковы были последние слова его генерала. Простой совет дал ему самый молодой кавалерист армии Красного дракона: «Лучшее, что может случиться в жизни – стать хозяином постоялого двора!». Вняв этим словам, он отправился в Ханчжоу. О нет, Вести мирную жизнь оказалось сложнее, чем воевать!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%92%8D%EC%9A%B4%EA%B0%9D%EC%9E%94/2640)

title.ja: The Alien Next to Me is Scary

altTitles.ja: 隣の宇宙人がコワい

description.en:
The passionate attempts to appeal of beautiful alien girl!? A slapstick comedy making the rounds on SNS is now invading!

Marunouchi-kun is a freshman boy who likes everything to do with space. Next to this boy, sits the transfer student Uchimura-san. Uchimura-san looks precisely like what you would call and alien, but it seems that she is hiding her true form......
[^ from Amazon & Bookwalker]

---
Your run of the mill high school boy who likes aliens, Marunouchi-kun, sits next to Uchimura-san who takes the form of something that is certainly alien. But her true form is...A beautiful high school girl!?
Making waves on SNS, A slapstick comedy of a beautiful alien girl making her fierce attempts to manipulate the situation.
[^ from ComicWalker and Niconico]

---
Alternative raw sites:
[Comic-walker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_KS13202607010000_68/)
[NicoNico](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55404)

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター リバースト
ポケットモンスターRéBURST

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

altTitles.ja: 本日の議題(ラブライブ!)

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - Mubou Shoujo Sayaka Sowaka (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 無謀少女さやかソワカ (魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.ja-ro: Mubou Shoujo Sayaka Sowaka (Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica)

altTitles.ja: 無謀少女さやかソワカ・りべんじ! (魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)

altTitles.ja-ro: Mubou Shoujo Sayaka Sowaka - Revenge! (Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica)

altTitles.ja: 無謀少女さやかソワカ番外編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mubou Shoujo Sayaka Sowaka - Bangaihen (Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica)

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.es-la: La chica hiena está destrás de mi.

altTitles.ja: ハイエナちゃんに狙われて

description.en: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
description.tr: Uzak mesafe kız arkadaşımın şehirden yaşça büyük yeni biriyle sevgili olduğunu öğrendim ve ben umutsuzluğun pençesindeyken Haibara Enako adında, diğer adıyla "Hyena-chan" olarak anılan bir kız aniden karşıma çıktı ve bana açıldı, " Erkek arkadaşım yok ve şu anda boşum."
description.pt-br: Após um término de namoro recente, nosso protagonista é abordado por Enako Haibara, também conhecida como “Hiena”…

description.en: The war between humans and vampires will come to an end with the victory of the vampires, as expected by all. In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."
description.ko: 인간과 뱀파이어와의 전쟁은 모두의 예상대로 뱀파이어의 승리로 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 아직 침략받지 않은 성지 ‘바할’에서 인류의 반격을 위한 각고의 노력 끝에 죽지 않는 ‘시체 기사’와 그를 움직일 수 있는 ‘동력원’ 제작에 성공하여, 검투사였던 ‘군터’를 ‘시체기사’로 되살리게 된다.

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

title.en: Mr. Villain Husband, the One You Should Be Obsessing With Is Over There

altTitles.en: Dear Villainous Husband, the One to Be Obsessed With Is Over There
The Person Who Is Obsessed With the Villain Husband Is Over There
Villainous Husband, the One You're Obsessed With Is Over There

altTitles.es-la: Marido Villano, con la que estas obsesionado esta en otra parte

description.en:
I’ve transmigrated into the body of the wife of the mad villain emperor in an angsty novel!
How will I escape? By running away quietly when the saintess he’ll become obsessed with appears.

This love-blind emperor won’t even remember that I exist once he lays eyes on the saintess! I really didn’t do anything. All I did was lay as low as I could so that I wouldn’t get on my crazy husband’s nerves…. But the villain emperor has asked me to return to the palace with him, and not the saintess. But she’s already here! Why are you obessessing over me?

altTitles.vi: Nàng Juliet ở trường nội trú

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

description.en: Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!
description.vi: Inuzuka Romio và Juliet Persia đang hẹn hò, song vì xuất thân từ hai đất nước đối địch nên họ không thể công khai mối quan hệ dù học chung một trường. Nhưng tình hình đã có sự thay đổi nhờ Hasuki - người bạn thơ ấu đem lòng thương Inuzuka!

altTitles.ja: ダークサモナーとデキている

altTitles.zh: 黑暗召唤师在地下恋爱中

altTitles.zh-ro: Hēi'àn zhàohuàn shī zài dìxià liàn'ài zhōng

altTitles.ja: I'm dating a Dark Summoner

description.en: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
description.ja: クソ真面目な神官・ロニのパーティに新しく加入してきたのは、悪魔の力を使うダークサモナーで亜人のアモナ。反発し合い犬猿の仲になると思われた二人だったが、なんとパーティ加入初日に朝チュンしてしまい…！？

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Của Chàng Chiến Binh Bị Ruồng Bỏ Bởi Đồng Đội Và Hôn Thê Của Mình

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)
description.vi: Toru Eiban là một thành viên của một party S-rank nổi tiếng. Nhưng vì dù có cố gắng đến đâu thì level của cậu không thể vượt quá level 20 được. Một ngày nọ cậu bị trưởng nhóm cũng là bạn thân của mình đuổi khỏi nhóm vì mình quá yếu, mọi chuyện cũng chẳng đến nỗi nào vì cậu cũng biết rằng mình rất yếu nhưng cậu còn phát hiện ra rằng hôn thê của mình cũng bị hắn cướp mất và từ mặt. Để xả cơn tức giận của mình cậu đã giết một con quái vật ở rìa thành phố nhưng vì một lý do nào đó một trong các skill của cậu [Tích trữ kinh nghiệm] bị hỏng khiến nó trả lại cho cậu một lượng kinh nghiệm khổng lồ. Giờ đây một Toru Eiban mới trên hành trình của riêng mình sẽ khám phá về sự thật về sức mạnh của mình và chữa lành những tổn thương trong lòng

altTitles.ja: Back Street Girls ～ゴクドルズ～
バックストリートガールズ ～ゴクドルズ～

description.en:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

title.en: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death
100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

altTitles.ja: セトウツミ

description.en:
Woken up from a date, he’s suddenly in a movie set? Wait, he’s been reborn as a baby martial artist!  
  
In Jongnam Clan, which was once one of the 9 strongest clans, he receives the name “Gunchung” and uses the knowledge of his past life to learn the true meaning of martial arts.  
  
When your perspective is different, your martial arts changes. Armed with knowledge, Gunchung brings about a new age of martial arts!

altTitles.ja: 淫魔

description.en:
On the way home from meeting her friend, Oh Hana meets 'Mama', a demon who feeds on human greed and lust.

In order to avoid this devilish crisis, she asks for help from a suspicious man, Luxria, whom she meets by chance, but this man makes a dangerous proposal.
"Do you want help? Then you should have sex with me."
description.ko:
친구를 만나고 집으로 돌아가던 중 인간의 색욕을 먹고 사는 악마, '음마'를 만나게 된 오하나.
위기를 모면하기 위해 우연히 만난 수상한 남자 '룩스리아'에게 도움을 요청하지만, 이 남자는 하나에게 위험한 제안을 한다.
"도움을 받고 싶나? 그렇다면 나와 섹스를 해야 돼."

title.en: Crows Gaiden Housenka - the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.ja: クローズ外伝鳳仙花 ―the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.ja-ro: Crows Gaiden Housenka: the beginning of HOUSEN

altTitles.vi: Ngoại truyện Crows Housenka: Sự khởi đầu của HOUSEN

description.en: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.

Hart is a death row inmate with self-destructive tendencies who is drafted into a dangerous mining mission in a perilous forest. There, he encounters the highest-ranking leader, who turns out to be his first love from whom he had once parted ways. Hart tries to resist the strings of fate, but he gradually falls into a dangerous love relationship that defies his status.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

altTitles.ja: アライブ 最終進化的少年

description.en:
A strange virus is making its way around the globe, causing its victims to commit suicide. In less than a week, it's become a lethal pandemic. Now a group of Tokyo teens who have survived the outbreak are wondering why they are still alive.  
  
 [Official Korean](https://ridibooks.com/books/505001316)   
 [Official Chinese](https://book.douban.com/series/10615)

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: パンをナメるな！

description.en: No education, no work experience, no friends. Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year-old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?! She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery.
description.ja:
引きこもり少女がパン屋の店長に！？

学歴・職歴・友達無しの少女 内木夢夢(うちきむゆ)は、2年間 家に引きこもって自堕落な生活を送っていた…しかし、そんな彼女に転機が訪れる――！！鎌倉に住む叔母からパン屋のお手伝いに呼ばれたのだ！ワケも分からないまま鎌倉に着いたむゆに待ち受けていたのはパン屋の店長代理としてお店で働くことで…！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘、すごくチョロい。

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy

altTitles.vi: Con gái của quỷ vương dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
description.ja:
かつて魔王と勇者は対決し、魔王は封印され勇者は力尽きた…。魔王の娘であるヘルは父の仇である勇者への恨みを晴らすべく、彼を蘇らせ、そして下僕としてこき使ってやろうと考えていた。だが、蘇ってきた勇者は何だかやたらとキラキラしていてカッコ良くて、ヘルの調子は狂いっぱなし。

果たして勇者を下僕として苦しめることは出来るのか…!?

altTitles.ja: 怖れ -令和怪談-

description.en: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

altTitles.ru: Как Младший Братик, Который Превратился в Девочку, Стал Девушкой Своего Старшего Брата

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

title.en: The Villainess Doesn't Need a New Husband!

altTitles.ko: 악녀님에겐 새 남편 따위 필요하지 않아요!

altTitles.ja: 悪女様には新しい夫なんて必要ありません

description.en:
What kind of dogs are there?

"The person who will be my groom is already dead!"

It's unfair that she died so absurdly, but she possessed the villain. And that, of course, while holding a 'soul wedding'! All he has is a sunfish body and a run-down mansion.

No, the dead groom isn't rich, but he even has debts? It's the original, it's Nabal, and I have to find my way of life first!

Meanwhile, the Duke of Fitzren came to visit her, claiming to be a close friend of her late husband. If this man touches the hearts of modern people by making warm bath water and iced americano, I think he can be a good shield to overcome this harsh world...

"Please be my fake mistress!"
description.fr: Qu'est-ce qui se passe ? J'ai transmigré dans le corps de la méchante au moment où elle a conclu un <Mariage d'âme>. Mon futur mari est déjà mort. Tout ce que j'ai,  c'est un corps sexy et une énorme dette ! Quoi, mon défunt mari n'était pas riche ? "Que dois-je faire pour vivre confortablement en tant que méchante ?" "Et l'Americano glacé ? Et le bain chaud ? "Je veux vivre comme ça !" J'ai essayé de faire du grabuge pour que personne ne puisse m'approcher.... "Si tu veux, je vais te sortir de là." "Si tu laisses ton siège et...." "C'est juste que l'une des rumeurs qui nous entourent va se concrétiser." Un homme est soudain apparu devant moi. "Je veux t'engager. Sois ma fausse maîtresse."

altTitles.ja: カム トゥ ハンド

description.en: Overworked schoolteacher, Miharu, collapses onto the icy roads. Along comes local tattoo artist, Arashi to save the day. However, it being Miharu's first time seeing so many tattoo's up close, he unintentionally makes some insensitive comments. To apologize, Miharu goes to his shop to apologize, where he realizes just how kind Arashi is. He feels comfortable chatting to someone of the same age, but also feels like something doesn't seem right…

title.en: The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning

altTitles.zh: 末日狠人：开局囤积万亿物资

altTitles.zh-hk: 末日狠人：開局囤積萬億物資

altTitles.zh-ro: Mò Rì Hěn Rén: Kāijú Túnjī Wàn Yì Wùzī
Mo Ri Hen Ren: Kaiju Tunji Wan Yi Wuzi

altTitles.en: Stockpiling in Apocalypse The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning
The Last All-Knowing Man Collected Trillions of Stuff from Day One

description.en: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

altTitles.ja: 君と掴む光。

description.en:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

“Marry me, Vivian.” She believed that she could have a happy future together with him. However, after he became emperor, everything started to change. His attitude suddenly changed. A strange rumor that he has an affair with a princess every night. In the end, I was confined to the imperial palace, and I only did what he told me to do. Then one day... “You are pregnant.”I don't need children.” What should I do, if I stay silent, I will lose my child.. I will protect my child even at the risk of my life! So Vivian decided to erase herself from everyone's memories and leave. “Stop it, forget me.”

altTitles.ja: 傭兵団の料理番

description.en: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.
description.ja: 料理人志望の青年・東朱里が異世界にトリップしたところから物語は始まる。朱里を拾ったのは、傭兵団の団長、ガングレイブ。雑用として傭兵団に身を寄せる朱里は、徐々に料理の腕を振るうことで自らの存在価値を高めていく。傭兵団の各隊長たちは一癖も二癖もある人物揃いだったが、朱里は料理を通じて彼らと心を通じ合わせていった。傭兵団の食事事情を改善し、時に発明を手伝ったりと少しずつ、朱里は傭兵団の仲間たちに認められていくのだった。しかし、朱里はまだ知らない。自分自身が英雄として語られる存在になることを…。
